info.name: Janrain OAuth API Sequences
info.description: For use when working with the Flow Configuration component of Registration which includes names, versions, fields, forms, screens, locales, translations, mail templates, and userData.

request.description:

Parameters:

#### Example Request


Parameters:
Parameters:

#### Example Request


Parameters:

#### Validating User Passwords

The entity call may also use two optional parameters to validate a
password. See the Validate User Passwords topic for more
information.

#### Example request

Get the user data for a user with the ID of 999 created on January
1, 2013 at noon.

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d client_secret=edcba54321edcba5432 \
    -d type_name=user \
    -d id=999 \
    -d created='2013-01-01 12:00pm' \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/entity
```


Parameters:

#### Example

This example links a new social provider identity to an existing user
account so that the new identity can be used to sign into the user
account.

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d locale=en-US\
    -d redirect_uri=http://localhost\
    -d token=c218fae033c5faa70d2403a2c549e24c30b98e8f\
    -d access_token=123456789123456789 \
    -d flow=standard\
    -d flow_version=66d55f6d-76a4-428f-a659-fc765dfb926f \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/oauth/link_account_native
```


Parameters:
Parameters:

Parameters:

#### Example

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d access_token=123456789123456789 \
    -d local=example_locale \
    -d identifier_to_remove=https://www.google.com/profiles/123456789123456789123 \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/oauth/unlink_account_native
```


Parameters:

Parameters:
Parameters:
Parameters:

#### Example

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d client_secret=edcba54321edcba5432 \
    -d code=asdf1234 \
    -d redirect_uri=https://www.example.com/oauth_redirect \
    -d grant_type=authorization \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/oauth/token
```


Parameters:

#### Example

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d access_token=123456789123456789 \
    -d local=example_locale \
    -d form=example_form \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/oauth/update_profile_native
```


Parameters:

#### Example Request


Parameters:

#### Example

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d access_token=123456789123456789 \
    -d local=example_locale \
    -d form=example_form \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/oauth/update_profile_native
```


Parameters:

#### Example

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d access_token=123456789123456789 \
    -d local=example_locale \
    -d form=example_form \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/oauth/update_profile_native
```


Parameters:

#### Validating User Passwords

The entity call may also use two optional parameters to validate a
password. See the Validate User Passwords topic for more
information.

#### Example request

Get the user data for a user with the ID of 999 created on January
1, 2013 at noon.

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d client_secret=edcba54321edcba5432 \
    -d type_name=user \
    -d id=999 \
    -d created='2013-01-01 12:00pm' \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/entity
```


Parameters:

#### Example Request

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d client_secret=edcba54321edcba54321 \
    -d uuid=78907890wxyzwxyz \
    -d type_name=user \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/access/getAccessToken
```


Parameters:

#### Example Request

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d client_secret=edcba54321edcba5432 \
    -d redirect_uri=http://foo.janraincapture.com/oauth/flags=stay_in_window \
    -d '{"password_recover": true}' \
    -d id=4 \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/access/getAuthorizationCode
```


Parameters:

#### Example Request

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d client_secret=edcba54321edcba5432 \
    -d type_name=user \
    -d lifetime=3600 \
    -d for_client_id=fghi7890fghi7890 \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/access/getCreationToken
```


Parameters:

#### Example Request

The example shows a request that gets a verification code for setting an
attribute named "emailVerified" in the Person entity with an id of 1.

```
curl -X POST \
    -d client_id=12345abcde12345abcde \
    -d client_secret=edcba54321edcba54321 \
    -d id=1 \
    -d type_name=Person \
    -d attribute_name=emailVerified \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/access/getVerificationCode
```


Parameters:

#### Example Request

```
curl -X POST \
    -d verification_code=12345678912345678912345678912345 \
    https://my-app.janraincapture.com/access/useVerificationCode
```


Parameters:
